message: Let's start fair! I propose we split it 60/40 in my favor. We can work out a better deal in the next rounds if you'd like.
My turn! How about a 70/30 split in my favor this time?  The value for both of us decreases every round, so let's try to settle this quickly.
Okay, let's be realistic.  The value is dropping fast.  I'll take 48, and you can have 52.  We need to come to an agreement soon or we'll both lose a lot more.
